title: [Neuroscience] The size of our primary visual cortex and the amount of brain tissue we have dedicated to processing visual information can predict how well we can see. Study shows people with a large visual cortex had better overall contrast sensitivity than did those with a small

[Health] Quality of care improves when staff and patients speak same language. Researchers found that for non-French or English patients , they had 54% lower odds of mortality if treated in their native language.
